properties.title: Spa Pool H2Lai Lenzerheide
properties.abstract: The newly opened spa pool H2Lai is an oasis for all those who enjoy water sports, pampering themselves or taking care of their health – a place to recover and relax.
properties.description: Guests now have an all year round heated outdoor pool as well as a sauna and spa area on the top floor. For the small ones there is a paddling pool, while older children can enjoy the 85-metre «Black Hole» slide. In the H2Lai spa pool you swim in revitalised «Grander» water. The smell of chlorine and the irritation to eye and skin is greatly lessened. The water feels soft and pleasant on the skin.
properties.name: Wellnessbad H2Lai
